subject: My car might be a vampire
description: I noticed that when I try using onions instead of petrol my car seems to stop working. Has anyone else had an issue with a car possibly being a vampire?

name: Tires that don't get tired
subject: When I was in high school I bought these michelin tires and haven't needed to replace them since. Does anyone else have a tire brand that they prefer? I may need to switch soon because it's been sooooo long
